articles.title: BMW Debuts All-Electric iX1 SUV
articles.description: BMW has added a new model to its electric vehicle lineup: the iX1 SUV.The car, which marks the first fully-electric iX1 model, will arrive with a dual-motor powertrain that produces a total output of 313 horsepower and 364 lb-ft of torque. The company estimatâ€¦
